short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Converts dollar amounts into time for perspective

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Works with most online retailers.

Easy to use:
Step 1: Download the extension
Step 2: Click TimeIsMoney icon
Step 3: Input hourly wage
Step 4: Go to any site that has prices. You will see the time conversion below the price!
